name: Critical Tests
description: Critical smoke tests essential for project functionality

name: Product Defects
description: Test failures indicating product defects requiring immediate attention

name: Test Defects
description: Issues with test infrastructure, setup, or configuration

name: Integration Failures
description: Failures in integration tests involving multiple components

name: API/External Service Issues
description: Failures related to external API calls or service dependencies

name: Performance Issues
description: Slow running tests or performance-related failures

name: Property-Based Test Failures
description: Hypothesis property-based testing failures revealing edge cases

name: Async/Concurrency Issues
description: Failures in asynchronous or concurrent test execution

name: Environment/Setup Issues
description: Issues related to test environment setup or platform differences

name: VCR/Mock Issues
description: Issues with VCR cassettes or mocking infrastructure

name: Skipped Tests
description: Tests that were skipped due to conditions or requirements

name: Smoke Test Failures
description: Critical smoke tests that verify core functionality

name: Coverage-Related Tests
description: Tests focused on code coverage and testing completeness

name: Refactored Test Suites
description: Tests in refactored suites that may have structural changes
